data.name: Seven: Reboot
data.detailed_description:
Seven: Reboot is a cryptic experimental puzzle game. It consists of a wide variety of puzzles, some of which are pretty easy to solve, but others are almost impossible to solve by just one person. This is a game about numbers, and their meaning, information and ways to hide it in everything!

Almost all of the puzzles in the game are available from the start.
You start by solving simple puzzles and gaining knowledge of the game's mechanics. This is when you realize that there are actually more puzzles than you thought! And that is the main beauty of the game; as you progress through the game puzzles will get more and more complicated, even reaching the point where it is impossible to solve them on your own!

Make notes, construct theories, communicate with other players and solve the mysteries of Seven!

data.short_description: Seven: Reboot is a cryptic experimental puzzle game. It consists of a wide variety of puzzles of all difficulties. It’s a game about numbers and their meaning. Make notes, construct theories, communicate with other players and solve the mysteries of Seven!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
